snippet: The Florida Panthers missed on two breakaways in the second period. Reilly Smith made sure they cashed in on their third....
lead_paragraph: The Florida Panthers missed on two breakaways in the second period. Reilly Smith made sure they cashed in on their third.

headline.main: Smith's Short-Handed Goal Lifts Panthers Over Avalanche, 3-1
headline.print_headline: Smith's Short-Handed Goal Lifts Panthers Over Avalanche, 3-1
